name: find the bamber (a dave and bambi game)
name_original: find the bamber (a dave and bambi game)
description:
Note:this Is a dave and bambi fan game 

Controls:

Use a mouse to find the bamber

Space key makes it harder by making dave faster

How to play:

Hover over the bamber to make him angry for a point

Avoid dave at all costs

Credits:

Moldygh made dave and bambi and music and the sprites.
